Description: Tiraz fragment, woven in white (bleached?) silk; decorated with a band bearing a pseudo-Hufic inscription and friezes of geometric and stylised vegetal motifs embroidered in green, blue and brown silk; running and figure stitches. Warp: silk, white (bleached?), Z, 16/cm Weft: silk, white (bleached?), Z, 14/cm
Acquisition name: Donated by: Maj William Joseph Myers (executors of)
